name: material-icon-theme.activeIconPack
desc: Select an icon pack that enables specific icons.

name: material-icon-theme.files.customClones
desc: Clone any existing icon and create a new one with custom colors and associations

name: material-icon-theme.folders.customClones
desc: Clone any existing icon and create a new one with custom colors and associations

name: material-icon-theme.folders.theme
desc: Set the type for the folder icons.

name: material-icon-theme.folders.color
desc: Change the color of the folder icons.

name: material-icon-theme.files.color
desc: Change the color of the file icons.

name: material-icon-theme.opacity
desc: Change the opacity of the icons.

name: material-icon-theme.saturation
desc: Change the saturation of the icons.
